comment:
* Represents an option to be shown to users for snoozing a notification until a given context
 * instead of for a fixed amount of time.
 * @hide

methods.name: public String getId()
methods.comment: * Returns the id of this criterion.

methods.name: public CharSequence getExplanation()
methods.comment:
* Returns the user visible explanation of how long a notification will be snoozed if
     * this criterion is chosen.

methods.name: public CharSequence getConfirmation()
methods.comment: * Returns the user visible confirmation message shown when this criterion is chosen.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
